  • Methodendetails

    • onStartButtonClicked

      public void onStartButtonClicked() throws IOException
      Description for the onStartButtonClicked method:

      In this method, all elements that get changed during the game, are set back to their beginning value. In addition to that, the Grid is filled with Buttons.

      Löst aus:
      IOException

    • Timer

      public void Timer()
      Description for the Timer method:

      In this Method, a timer is started, and every second, the timer gets updated.

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
      Description for the stopTimer method:

      In this Method, the timer gets stopped.

    • revealFields

      public void revealFields(int COL, int ROW)
      Description for the revealFields method:

      In this Methode, first it is checked, if the click is the first click at the current game, and therefor the mines get placed excluding the Field that is clicked. After that, two for-loops are called, to go through the "Fields" that surround the clicked Button. if there are zero mines nearby, the method is called recursive.

      Parameter:
      COL - the Colum of the Button, that is clicked
      ROW - the Row of the Button, that is clicked

    • revealAllFields

      public void revealAllFields()
      Description for the revealAllFields method:

      In this Methode, all fields are revealed.

    • placeMinesAfterFirstClick

      public void placeMinesAfterFirstClick(int firstClickCol, int firstClickRow)
      Description for the placeMinesAfterFirstClick method:

      In this Method, the coordinates, of the first Button clicked, and the surrounding Buttons are store, so they can get excluded. Now we can place all the mines, and exclude the before mentioned Fields. After all that, all fields are getting the value of the bombs nearby set.

      Parameter:
      firstClickCol - Colum of the Button, that was clicked first
      firstClickRow - Row of the Button, that was clicked first

    • getMines_Near_Position

      public int getMines_Near_Position(int COL, int ROW)
      Description for the getMinesNearPosition method:

      In this Method, the mines of the Button, that is chosen, gets counted, by looking for bombs in the neighbor Fields. Depending on the count, the number gets a different colour.

      Parameter:
      COL - the selected Colum
      ROW - the selected Row
      Gibt zurück:
      minesNearby

    • checkGameStatus

      public void checkGameStatus()
      Description for the checkGameStatus method:

      In this Method, it is checked, if the user has already won. This is done, by checking if the user has revealed all non-mine-fields and marked all mine-fields. Two booleans are created, and set to true, but if the conditions above are not true, the booleans are set to false, and the game goes on, until eventually the user has won, and then the Game-Over-Screen is displayed and the user has won.

    • showGameOverScreen

      public void showGameOverScreen(boolean won)
      Description for the showGameOverScreen method:

      In this Method, the Game-Over-Screen gets displayed.

      Parameter:
      won - boolean, to see if the user has won = true, or not won = false

    • setDifficulty

      public void setDifficulty(String difficulty)
      Description for the setDifficulty method:

      In this Method, the data from the difficulty-Settings, depending on the selected difficulty get written into the local variables.

      Parameter:
      difficulty - the difficulty selected

    • setEvenSize

      public void setEvenSize()
      Description for the setDifficulty method:

      In this Method, the Rows and Columns get the same size, by taking 100% of the grid, and deviding that with the amount of Rows/Cols.

    • getFieldsMarked

      public int getFieldsMarked()

    • setFieldsMarked

      public void setFieldsMarked(int fieldsMarked)
      Description for the setFieldsMarked method:

      In this Method, the text of the MinesRemaining TextField is updated

    • switchToMenu

      public void switchToMenu() throws IOException
      Description for the switchTOMenu method:

      In this Method, the active stage is switched to the menu-view.

      Löst aus:
      IOException
